game.name: Angry Zombies
game.description:
Keep your fear aside and show off your intense shooting abilities in this action-packed survival challenge! Your journey is not going to be easy at all since your path is full of blood-thirsty souls who will attack you without showing mercy. Make sure to get you ready with your slingshot to destroy the huge world of deadly souls. No time limit, only fun when you try out this brand new single-player shooting game! Be careful as you have limited shots to use!

Click the play button and be prepared to choose the level between Easy and Hard level. In each level, there are 12 unique and challenging stages to explore. Try to complete your mission with the least possible shots to finish each stage with the maximum score possible in this cool HTML5 slingshot game! Your objective is to kill all the zombies you see on the screen. You can see them standing on different locations so aim you shot at the right angle to kill your target.

Try to hit the TNT to have a blast and make more damage to these deadly zombies! Track how many shots are left by having a look at the top left corner of the screen in cool shooter challenge! Perform wisely to grab some extra points and upgrade your sling in the advanced level! Our free online game website features many top titles from the category of action-packed challenges that are full of fun and excitement for the gamers. Good luck to have a blast in awesome zombie games that are free to play online without download!
